resources.string: Language was successfully changed to English

Welcome. You are on main screen. Use gestures to navigate. Swipe left to listen game instructions. Swipe right to manage application settings. Swipe down to start game. Swipe up to leave the application.
You are on settings screen. Use gestures to navigate. Swipe top to set language to Polish. Swipe down to change game difficulty. Swipe left to go back to main screen.
You are on instructions screen. Use gestures to navigate. Swipe bottom to listen instructions. Swipe right to go back to main screen.

The goal of the game for user is to repeat gestures sequence. Level number is equal to amount of gestures to repeat. With every level, user has to remember one additional gesture. It means that on every level user has to perform sequence from previous one and single new gesture. User can\'t start level until the entire sequence has been told, so he has to remember it.
